summary: Sabine Bergmann-Pohl  is a German conservative politician who served as the last head of state of East Germany from 5 April to 2 October 1990. On 3 October, East and West Germany were reunited.
full_text: Sabine Bergmann-Pohl  is a German doctor and politician. A member of the Christian Democratic Union of Germany , she was president of the People's Chamber of East Germany from April to October 1990. As such, she served as acting head of state of East Germany until its merger into West Germany in October. After the reunification of Germany, she served in the government of Chancellor Helmut Kohl.
title: Sabine Bergmann-Pohl
